com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface VpgResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    @Path(value="/vpgs")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface VpgResource
extends Serializable
    Vpg Resource interface.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ZertoFailoverTestAlert addVpgFailoverTestAlert(String vpgUuid, ZertoFailoverTestAlert alert)
      Add a Vpg Failover Test Alert for the given VPG.
      CoreTask commitFailover(String vpgUuid)
      Commits changes after a live failover.
      CoreTask failover(String vpgUuid, FailoverParams params)
      Initiates a live failover on the VPG.
      CoreTask failoverTest(String vpgUuid, FailoverTestParams params)
      Test failover for a VPG.
      CoreTask failoverTestStop(String vpgUuid, FailoverTestStopParams params)
      Stop a VPG failover test and provide feedback as to whether the test was successful.
      InputStream getFailoverReport(String vpgUuid, String taskUuid, String filename)
      Gets a failover report for a task.
      FailoverReportDetails getFailoverReportDetails(String vpgUuid, String taskUuid)
      Gets failover report details for a failover task.
      ServiceProfile getServiceProfile(String vpgUuid)
      Gets the service profile for a VPG.

      Gets the VMs that belong to a VPG.

      Gets a VPG by UUID, with options to expand child entites.

      Get checkpoints for a VPG.

      Retrieve the Vpg Failover Test Alert for the given VPG.

      Returns VPG performance samples given a performance serie information.

      Remove a Vpg Failover Test Alert for the given VPG.
      CoreTask rollbackFailover(String vpgUuid)
      Rolls back changes after a live failover.

      • getVpgFailoverTestAlertFor

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vpgUuid}/alert")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
ZertoFailoverTestAlert getVpgFailoverTestAlertFor(@PathParam(value="vpgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                     String vpgUuid)
        Retrieve the Vpg Failover Test Alert for the given VPG.
        Parameters:
        vpgUuid - vpg uuid
        Returns:
        zerto failover test alert

      • getVpgPerfFor

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vpgUuid}/p")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
PerfSampleSerie getVpgPerfFor(@PathParam(value="vpgUuid")
                                                                                                                             String vpgUuid,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="group")
                                                                                                                             String group,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                             String name,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                             String type,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="start")
                                                                                                                             Long start,
                                                                                                                             @QueryParam(value="end")
                                                                                                                             Long end)
        Returns VPG performance samples given a performance serie information.
        Parameters:
        vpgUuid - the VPG unique identifier.
        group - performance group name
        name - performance name
        type - performance type
        start - start date
        end - end date
        Returns:
        a performance serie for the vpg, counter and time range

      • failoverTest

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{vpgUuid}/failover-test")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask failoverTest(@PathParam(value="vpgUuid")

                                                                                                                                                                                               FailoverTestParams params)
        Test failover for a VPG.
        Parameters:
        vpgUuid - the VPG unique identifier
        params - the failover test parameters
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • failoverTestStop

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{vpgUuid}/failover-test-stop")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask failoverTestStop(@PathParam(value="vpgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                        String vpgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        FailoverTestStopParams params)

        Parameters:

        params - the failover test stop parameters
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • getFailoverReportDetails

      • getFailoverReport

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vpgUuid}/failover-report/{taskUuid}/download")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+octet-stream")
InputStream getFailoverReport(@PathParam(value="vpgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                       String vpgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                       @PathParam(value="taskUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                       String taskUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                       @QueryParam(value="filename")
                                                                                                                                                                       String filename)
        Gets a failover report for a task.
        Parameters:
        taskUuid - the uuid of the task to retrieve the report for
        Returns:
        failover report
